item.title: Research team discovers seven new dark comets, identifies 2 types based on orbit and size

item.title: How to print a car: High-performance multi-material 3D printing techniques
item.description: A future where lightweight car parts can be made with a 3D printer is here, thanks to multi-material additive manufacturing research.
